sources.title: Zis Boom Bah (1941)
sources.description: "Hey, kids, let's get together and put on a show!" That's the idea behind this raucous spoof about a vaudeville performer who's sent to college to spy on his bratty son. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/zis-boom-bah-1941/

sources.title: Zis Boom Bah
sources.description: A rich former vaudeville mother tries to turn her rich carefree son into a responsible adult.

sources.title: Zis Boom Bah (1941) HUNTZ HALL COMEDY
sources.description:
Stars: Huntz Hall, Grace Hayes, Peter Lind Hayes
Director: William Nigh

"Hey, kids, let's get together and put on a show!" That's the idea behind this raucous spoof about a vaudeville performer who goes to college to spy on her bratty son.

sources.title: Zis Boom Bah (1941) Comedy, Music, Romance Full Length Movie
sources.description:
"Hey, kids, let's get together and put on a show!" 
That's the idea behind this raucous spoof about a vaudeville performer who goes to college to spy on her bratty son.

Director: William Nigh
Writers: Connie Lee, Harvey Gates
Stars: Grace Hayes, Peter Lind Hayes, Mary Healy 
Genres: Comedy, Musical, Romance
